content:
The following are the logical/bitwise operators defined in Visual Basic.

And Operator

Not Operator

Or Operator

Xor Operator

AndAlso Operator

OrElse Operator

IsFalse Operator

IsTrue Operator

See Also

Operator Precedence in Visual Basic
Logical and Bitwise Operators in Visual Basic
